entry.title: The Gotham Promethus
entry.summary:
Author: up_tonogood

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,345Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 27

Summary: A reimagining of Mary Shelley‚Äôs Frankenstein: The Modern Prometheus, but the creature is Jason Todd. Dick Grayson sails into the Arctic, chasing whispers that his lost brother, Jason, may still walk the world of the living. You are a young artist, hired for an Arctic exhibition, who becomes entangled in a web of grief, rebirth, and a bunch of angsty monologues.

entry.title: I Left My Heart in Wynwood
entry.summary:
Author: xbeautifulxrealityx

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 762,589Chapters: 98/?Kudos: 807

Summary: A high-stakes heist in Miami should have been a straightforward job, but when you unexpectedly run into your insufferable ex, who makes you the offer of a lifetime.. things spiral out of control. Amidst a whirlwind of chaotic encounters and sizzling new flings, you‚Äôre pulled deeper into the lucrative world of alien tech development. As you juggle ambition, romance, and a web of deceit, every reckless decision sends shockwaves through your life. In a world where illusions rule and betrayal lurks at every turn, you must navigate a treacherous path to build your own empire and rise from the ashes of your past. Will you emerge victorious or be consumed by the chaos?No y/n used.*also I‚Äôve started to edit/ rewrite some of the first chapters so yeah lol

entry.title: The Black Widow of Gotham
entry.summary:
Author: TheMostUniqueName20

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,002Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 46

Summary: When y/n was 11 years old, she was enrolled at Gotham Academy under a false identity, placed by her Red Room handlers as a part of an early infiltration assignment. "Find out more about the Wayne family, get close to them, and take them out." But what happens when you get too close to the supposed enemy? What happens when you form genuine connections? What happens when you feel like a kid again? Forgetting you're supposed to hurt the Waynes, not be one? Well, the Red Room will step in and cut you out and start your training from scratch again, all while leaving those who now have a connection with you wondering where you are, where it went wrong, if you're okay.... Eventually, they accept your disappearance until you've eventually become a faded memory to them. ¬† Until... 8 years later..... ¬† (Use of y/n for right now will be replaced with "___", sorry for bad summary üòÖ)

entry.title: desire, i'm hungry
entry.summary:
Author: yourstrulykoios

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,510Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 12

Summary: ‚ÄúSo what do you want then, kid?‚Äù He moves his hand away from the gaping tear in your flesh, resting a warm palm at the base of your spine. It was anything but comforting, his other hand still gripping onto your nape like a branding iron, his touch burning into your flesh and keeping you shoved down into the mattress. Something ugly reared up in your chest, something so hungry you hardly recognized it as you. ‚ÄúTo eat.‚Äù Your voice was muffled in the blanket, saliva pooling between your incisors and canines. He laughed at you, deep and mean. It ignites your skin, sends a wild flurry of goosebumps up your arms, and you don‚Äôt answer properly, you don‚Äôt even try. Because with a sinking feeling in your gut, you realize that he could strike you against your cheek right here, right now, and you would kneel at his feet and say thank you.

entry.summary:
Author: River_Shayde

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,410Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 8

Summary: Ever wonder what would happen if Dick had to raise Jason, Tim, and Damian during the 1960s in Gotham? What if they all met a once privileged girl who lost everything and now has to acclimate life in the greaser side of town? How will they all interact and face the villains, socs, and family issues that make up their daily life?Reader turns 18 a few days after meeting the family, and this will mainly be a Jason and Tim love story. I might do two endings depending on how I feel and the direction that the story goes. Protective vibes will be in play.Setting inspired by Grease and the Outsiders.

entry.title: Books and bars
entry.summary:
Author: ReaderBOMG

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,240Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 42

Summary: When a drunk, heart broken librarian swipes right on Jason Todd, their story unfolds in the crime filled streets of Gotham as many secrets are revealed to each other with many dates. This is a light hearted fic of Librarian reader and Jason inspired by the Wayne family adventures and it contains a lot of fluff and smut and even more typos and mistakes. But I still hope you guys enjoy my first work!<3
